title: 3D Animation Game-Based Project Leadership Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)-based collaborative learning space.

learning_goals: Students can complete a 5-minute educational animation storyboard through 3D animation production games
Students can manage the animation production process (storyboarding-modeling-rigging-rendering) step-by-step using in-game mission systems
Students can propose at least three quality management and improvement strategies for team projects through peer evaluation systems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
